# Using caveman to call Somatic SNVs

Launch the cgpbox docker container using the link on the Desktop

```{}
caveman.pl -r ref_data/cgp/reference_files/genome.fa.fai -ig ref_data/cgp/reference_files/caveman/ucscHiDepth_0.01_merge1000_no_exon.tsv -b ref_data/cgp/reference_files/caveman/flagging -u ref_data/cgp/reference_files/caveman -s HUMAN -sa GRCh37 -t 32 -st genomic -in pre-computed-results/HCC1143_vs_HCC1143_BL.germline.bed -tc pre-computed-results/tum.cn.bed -nc pre-computed-results/norm.cn.bed -tb data/cell-line/HCC1143.mix1.n20t80.reheader.chr3.sub.bam -nb data/cell-line/HCC1143.NORMAL.30x.compare.reheader.chr3.sub.bam -o Day3/

```
